mapper.select: SELECT i.INDICA_CD, count(id.prod_order_detail_cd) as prodCount, i.INDICA_DT FROM INDICA i JOIN INDICA_DTL id ON i.indica_cd = id.indica_cd GROUP BY i.INDICA_CD, i.INDICA_DT

SELECT id.prod_order_detail_cd, b.prdt_nm, id.BOM_CD ,i.indica_cd, id.edcts_cd, id.indica_cnt, id.wk_fr_dt FROM INDICA i JOIN INDICA_DTL id ON i.indica_cd = id.indica_cd JOIN bom b ON id.bom_cd = b.bom_cd WHERE id.indica_cd = #{indicaCd}

SELECT pp.prod_order_detail_cd, pr.prcs_nm, pp.prcs_cd , pp.prcs_pr, vi.rsc_cd, vi.oust_cnt,id.indica_cnt, id.wk_fr_dt, pp.complete FROM PRCS_PROG pp JOIN indica_dtl id ON pp.prod_order_detail_cd = id.prod_order_detail_cd JOIN prcs pr ON pp.prcs_cd = pr.prcs_cd JOIN v_prodBom vi ON id.bom_cd = vi.bom_cd AND pp.prcs_pr = vi.eq_sq WHERE pp.prod_order_detail_cd = #{prodOrderDetailCd}
